title: 'Welcome Modiji' Buses in London To Congratulate Narendra Modi? A FactCheck
subtitle: The images are of 2015, when a bus named Modi Express was launched by the Indians living in UK
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Welcome Modi Ji has been written on all the city buses of London after the Bharatiya Janata Party's victory in the Lok Sabha Elections 2019. This amount of respect and honour has not been given to any country’s prime minister yet.

The images are of 2015, when Britain's Indian diaspora launched a bus named Modi Express. This was done ahead of Narendra Modi's visit to the city of London in October that year.
